CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Customer_Journey_Total__c <= 15, Customer_Journey_Total__c > 0), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01524000004lpcl", "Red",25, 25), IF(AND(Customer_Journey_Total__c <= 30, Customer_Journey_Total__c > 15), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01524000004lpcq", "Amber",25, 25), IF(Customer_Journey_Total__c > 30, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01524000004lpcv", "Green",25, 25), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151o000005ZuOI", "No Status", 25, 25))))
CustomField.label: Customer Journey
